text:
Anyone using HubSpot for B2B marketing/sales? Looking for beta testers for an AI-powered revenue intelligence app. It helps you  accurately prioritize leads, and recommends “next best action” to increase conversions. The app forecasts revenue and shows the effectiveness of your marketing campaigns.

If you:

• have been using HubSpot at least a year, 
• have at least 1,000 contacts in HubSpot, 
• use HubSpot as your primary marketing/sales platform,
and you’re interested in testing, give me a shout here or email <mailto:pchalasani@xaipient.com|pchalasani@xaipient.com>
